summary: The Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex is a big city area in Texas with over 7.6 million people, making it the fourth largest in the United States. It includes the cities of Dallas and Fort Worth and is a major economic and cultural center. The region has a strong economy with many large companies, especially in banking, technology, and healthcare. It is also known for its universities and medical research. The metroplex has a diverse population, including a large LGBT community and many megachurches.
title: Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex
